Registry of Open Data on AWS

CMIP6 GCMs downscaled using WRF

agriculture atmosphere climate earth observation environmental model oceans simulations weather

Description

High-resolution historical and future climate simulations from 1980-2100

Update Frequency

New downscaled results are uploaded as soon as they become available

License

Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International License

Documentation

https://dept.atmos.ucla.edu/alexhall/downscaling-cmip6

Managed By

See all datasets managed by UCLA Center for Climate Science.

Contact

Usage Examples

Tutorials

Resources on AWS

  • Description
    WRF output files
    Resource type
    S3 Bucket
    Amazon Resource Name (ARN)
    arn:aws:s3:::wrf-cmip6-noversioning
    AWS Region
    us-west-2
    AWS CLI Access (No AWS account required)
    aws s3 ls s3://wrf-cmip6-noversioning/ --no-sign-request
    Explore
    Browse Bucket
